FindingName: ExchangeMailTips: one of the settings is not properly configured
Description: MailTips assist end users with identifying strange patterns to emails they send
DefaultValue:
MailTipsAllTipsEnabled: False
MailTipsExternalRecipientsTipsEnabled: False
MailTipsGroupMetricsEnabled: False
MailTipsLargeAudienceThreshold: 25
ExpectedValue:
MailTipsAllTipsEnabled: True
MailTipsExternalRecipientsTipsEnabled: True
MailTipsGroupMetricsEnabled: True
MailTipsLargeAudienceThreshold: >25

References.Text: 14.1 Establish and Maintain a Security Awareness Program
